title: Fix navbar logo src and ensure correct static asset is present

requirements.summary: Update the HomeNavbar logo src to the provided filename without the -1 suffix.
acceptanceCriteria: Only the selected navbar logo `` element is changed (no unrelated images or components are modified).

file_operations.description: Change only the selected navbar logo `` element's `src` from the `...pkg-1.png` file to `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png`, leaving all other code and images untouched.

requirements.summary: Add the provided logo file to the generated static assets directory so it is served at the required URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The file `frontend/public/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` is present in the repo/build output.
Loading the app shows the navbar logo rendered (no broken image icon) and the network request for the image returns HTTP 200.

file_operations.description: Ensure the static logo file exists at this exact path (copy/import the user-provided `Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` into `frontend/public/assets/generated/`) so it is served at `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png`.
